name: ext_R5_AdverseEvent_su_causality
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Information on the possible cause of the event
element.definition: `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality` maps to R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.
